This sounds like a good idea, but unless its heavily nerfed or extremely hard to get it will be to OP and would ruin the point of mining.

Well actually what I meant is if you have iron sword and diamond as a item first put iron sword or any tool as you want then put diamond or any ore item and finally you get diamond sword, converting block needs tool and ore to able to convert to newer tool.
Good idea! It would make wandering traders useful and opens up an opportunity to add a new trim only available to get through the trader!

Please make the animations for all entities a lot more realistic, such as the mobs knees actually bend (in the right direction, of course!). After all, the frogs and warden got a unique movement animation.
Squid is in need of this update.
This is a genius idea.
se ve algo dificil pero si lo hacen seri genial
I think that they should look like the trailer, as in no knees or elbows.
NO WAY YOU ARE DOING THAT, that’s a TERRIBLE idea there will be SO many bugs
If not as part of Vanilla, then maybe as a Mojang-developed downloadable, optional mod. (modification)
good idea

Let's not forget to mention structures as well. Sure, something like a full scale Obsidian Pinnacle style mega dungeon wouldn't fit into normal Minecraft, but taking inspiration and cutting things down to a sensible size would make for some great additions, like a mountain peak castle, a ruined tundra town (more advanced than just an abandoned tundra village) or the trap and trouble heavy catacombs, just to name a few examples.
They should add enchantments from Minecraft dungeons

I agree. If this unnamed update really is about personalization, the world of color update should always be spearheaded as a way to customize pottery. I recommend along with this that someone should be able to right-click dye on one side of the pot to only decorate one of the patterns. This feature may allow more diversity in pots in general. Comparing this to pieces of armor with the armor trims. People may mix up different colors of trims to gain a specific look. I think the same should be done with individual sides of archaeological pots.

it would be so fun! in addition, since archeology pots are 1 pixel narrow, it works pretty well as columns, and would mix very good with all terracota colors, being able to put the four types of double flowers and big ferns in it would be a banger for customization, also, what if a sappling turn into a bonsai when planted in a pot? definitely so much potentian, and finnally, since we have patterns for banners, we should be able to use them in pots too! specially the flower pattern

Dyed plain pots would also be a good way to add depth and details to terracotta builds. At the moment, with no terracotta slabs or stairs available, it's hard to add little details to builds using these blocks. If we had coloured pots we could stack them like columns or other details for these builds.
Also make flower pots Dye-able!
Great idea!
bro so good
This could make it overpowered. The reason why it is 64 is so items that dont form a stack can be combined into once spot.

honestly, if bundles were reworked to hold 3 stacks, it would be perfect without giving it too much power, holding several single-slot tools; shears, flint&steel, and telescope; in a bundle would do way more for inventory issues and Sulkers would still be better when you get to them especially if you can't store bundles in sulker boxes. Heck, I'd be fine if instead, you could only have 192 slots for the same type of block, but 64 for a mixed bundle. which would only make bundles handy for mining or building.
cool idea!
To the above comment: I don't think two spots (128) is very overpowered considering shulker boxes do exist in the game. This just allows you to have a larger variety of random items.
Good idea. You will be able to store two tools in one slot (pickaxe+shovel for example)
Maybe it could keep 64 items but it would also be abble to stack non stackable things and all items would take 1 space

Considering how difficult it is to make multiple bundles(finding enough rabbits or breeding) vs just getting a single skulker box, I think this is a great suggestion to improve their usefulness. Plus you could then have two non stackable items like maps in there as well.
its to remove item clutter of items, not storage

I think bundles should be reworked, 
for example they should have 5 slots just like the hopper and have new gui or 
3 slots but if its in invntory only 
(adds 3 slots to the side of an inventory)
and the recipie should be changed (for harder one bc of balance)

yes such a good idea i love it

I was hoping the sniffers could dig up the old Minecraft roses that existed before the poppy and dandelion. I’m original olden Minecraft we only had access to 2 flowers: the red rose and the yellow rose. It would be a cute Easter egg if the sniffer could dig these roses up. Also would offer new decoration options with those flowers.

Translated:

I would like you to add Cobblestone Steve as the default character because he appeared in the first Minecraft trailer even before Alex and he never even appeared in a pack
What is cobble stone steve?
Hmmm… What if this was a sort of skin you get by doing a certain task, like let’s say defeating the ender dragon for the first time. Or is that too easy…
LOL
Yo tengo Minecraft de Xbox 360 y cuando cargas algo aparece de fondo una estatua de Steve
Please make rainbow steve and redstone steve diamond steve to
Gran idea, esto haría que la antropología sea más utilizada.
And brewing from some ancient plants.

I think the Sniffer is a cute little animal but I think it should sniff and find you some valuable items ( even in creative) such as gems and items! But I think that it is wonderful...I hope that soon they will add a new animal!

The sniffers find different seeds in different biomes?. Even a special seed in end dimension. But end is stone.. hmmm Or maybe in warped forest in the nether? Mangrove biome different seeds. Jungle gives different seeds. If you catch my drift. Sniff

Make the sniffer easier to get. I shouldn’t have to search for 6 hours. Hoping and praying to find a structure. A structure that has suspicious sand. That gives me a TINY chance of getting an egg. IT WAS A MOB VOTE CREATURE I FEEL I WILL NEVER SEE. WHAT IS THE POINT IN ADDING IT.

When the Sniffer was added, I assumed that it would be able to dig up other mob spawn eggs, but the current design of the sniffer may not go that direction. Sniffer still has potential with the plants it digs up to be used as recipes for new potions. The pitcher pods, with how big they are, could be for growth potions, torch flowers for shrink potions. Additionally, they could spread that effect to mobs that cross by it just as wither roses damage you as you cross.
(Imagine a fantastical flower field where mobs grow larger/smaller/other effects)
Using both flowers and a piece of a mob could make a new ingredient for the morph potion. Rarer ancient plants could later be added to other biomes/dimensions to engage players to revisit those areas, such as a levitation flower in end or ancient sapling(massive green trees).
We had a new idea and images for two new sniffer plants. We really love the sniffer mob and have about 25 of them currently.

Agreed. 
New plants the sniffer can dig up would be nice.
It would also fulfil the promise made that these sniffers were supposed to introduce new seed types. The keyword being it was plural and not just 2 types of decorative plants to meet the minimum.

Not to mention the missed opportunity for letting the Torch flower give off light.
Glowberries Glow, why not the torch flower?

The sniffer could also dig up a variety of seeds depending on a biome. That is if it has enough of a variety of seeds it could dig up.
The mob is tedious to get a hold of for just 2 flowers. Not to mention the player would need to find at least 2 eggs to breed them.

Since the Sniffer is a mob that is 'reborn' by the player, I think there's a lot of potential that can be looked into here for future updates or 'drops'. Mainly, the dimension the Sniffer lives in is the biggest opportunity here!

The Torchflower and Pitcher Plant are good for the Overworld.

However, if the player places grass or creates a Sniffer pen in the Nether or End, they should be able to obtain different plants compared to the Overworld. For the Nether, maybe something like a Fire Poppy and a Warped Hyacinth could be obtainable. For the end, have the plants be something a Purpur Rose and a Void Root.

Lots of fun potential to be had, and I hope the Sniffer gets expanded on at some point in the future.
Sniffers should be able to root up new seeds like advertised in their mob vote trailer, and have one of those seeds be able to be planted to where you could use it to breed sniffers.
One or two more. I am down for new mobs!
The new mob that would be good to be in the cherry biome would be: The Hummingbird. Since it could add more life to the cherry biome, and could pollinate the cherry trees.
And that the hummingbirds have a nest where they can lay their eggs and hatch it so that the baby comes out.

I like the idea, but I still think cobblestone chests are highly needed. Chests and keys would be assigned a name and color. The chest can not be broken unless the player has the key in their off-hand.
